================
HBase User Guide
================

This guide provides Yahoos with a simplified version of documentation for HBase, 
an open-source, distributed, versioned, column-oriented store modeled after Google’s 
`BigTable <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bigtable>`_. For more comprehensive documentation, 
refer to `The Apache HBase™ Reference Guide <http://hbase.apache.org/book/book.html>`_.
